overview: "I know you keep saying I look great, but I'm pretty nervous about this whole thing," says your wife Katie Morgan. As she opens the door, you are presented with Jax Slayher, a good looking, younger black man. Jax takes the seat next to your wife and begins to rub her leg. As you climb into your car, you send a text to your wife; "Be home soon, the convention went great". You round the corner to the kitchen and slow to a stop as you see your wife Sarah Vandella and your boss Seth Gamble. To make it fair, if you cheated on her, she should get to cheat on you. So your boss says the deal is simple, he'll fuck your wife and you'll get to keep your job. One condition you have to watch the whole thing happen. Officer Charles Dera interrupts your sexy plan: you're wanted for international fraud. Suddenly, it hits her -- you were trying to flee the country, not go on a romantic getaway with her. You try to beg for forgiveness, but your wife is already undressing the officer.
title: Be The Cuck Vol. 1
